org.synyx.messagesource

Class Messages

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.synyx.messagesource.Messages

  • public class Messages
extends Object
    Wrapper class that holds messages.
    Author:
    Marc Kannegiesser - kannegiesser@synyx.de

      Creates a new instance.

      Creates a new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Messages

        public Messages(Map<Locale,Map<String,String>> messages)
        Creates a new instance. The map might also contain a null-Value indicating default-messages (for all other Locales).
        Parameters:
        messages - a Map of Locales to a Map of key=value pairs (message-code to message)

      • Messages

        public Messages()
        Creates a new instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocales

        public Set<Locale> getLocales()
        Returns all Locales this instance holds messages for. This might also contain a null-Value indicating default-messages (for all other Locales).
        Returns:
        all available Locales

      • getMessages

        public Map<String,String> getMessages(Locale locale)
        Returns a Map containing message-code to message pairs for a given Locale or null if there are no messages for the given Locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to return messages for
        Returns:
        a Map containing messages (String, String).

      • setMessages

        public void setMessages(Locale locale,
               Map<String,String> map)
        Sets messages (message-code to message) for a given Locale. The locale may be null indicating default messages (for all other Locales).
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to set messages for or null for default
        map - a Map of String to String containing messages for the given Locale

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(Locale locale,
              String key,
              String message)
        Adds a message for a given Locale with the given message-code
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to add the message for
        key - the String representing the key for the message
        message - the String representing the message itself

      • removeMessage

        public void removeMessage(Locale locale,
                 String key)
        Removes the message-value with the given message-code for the given Locale
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to remove the message for
        key - the message-key to remove

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(Locale locale,
                String key)
        Returns the value of a given message-code for the given Locale or null if not found
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to return the message for or null for default
        key - the message-code to return the message for
        Returns:

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getFullInfo

        public String getFullInfo()

      • hasMessage

        public boolean hasMessage(Locale locale,
                 String key)
        Returns true if the given message-code is defined for the given Locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the Locale to search the key for or null for default
        key - the message-code to search for
        Returns:
        true if there is a message for the given Locale and message-code, false otherwise
